titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that management and administrative activities will not be taken into account in determining if an entity has sufficient business activities in a foreign country to avoid treatment as an expatriated entity.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/28/2007--Introduced. Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions defining expatriated business entities to exclude any management or administrative activities conducted by such entities in a foreign country in determining expatriate status for income tax purposes.
